Klant follows Torca.

Comic Book Guy looks at my post.

Comic Book Guy: Wor=
st...post...ever...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Alloran2@aol.c=
om 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, June 28, 2001 9:59 PM
 =
 Subject: Im Back


  OOC: Im back from Martha's Vineyard.  My vacation was=
 very good.   
  Lordofdarkness, i don't mean to be rude, but Jetstorm is a=
 former character 
  of mine.  I give you permission to use him, but please=
 ask next time.  I just 
  read 263 e-mails, so please forgive me if this p=
ost is innacurate. 

  :::Wheeljack/Torca::: 

  ::he turns to Vamprah:: 
 =
 Wheeljack: OK, so where do you want to start? 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Torca smiled::=
 
  Torca: As optimus Prime once said, "Transform and Roll Out!" 
  ::He tr=
ansformed to beast mode and started following the others::

ahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
